loginBox.loginGreet: Oi, log in to Amity, innit?
loginBox.serverUnreachable: Oi, this instance is either offline or don't exist, mate
loginBox.fillAllSpaces: Come on, fill in all the bloomin' spaces, yeah?

sidebar.noChats: Ain't got no one to chat wiv, bruv...
sidebar.noChatsDesc: Sort it out, yeah? Join or make a group by smashin' the "more" button up top

start.aboutAmity: Amity's a proper open-source, decentralised chat app, so anyone can chinwag wiv mates, innit?
